title: N173 Gilbert & Bacon Proof Gastright Columbus SOLD
author: packs

posts.post_title: N173 Gilbert & Bacon Proof Gastright Columbus SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone,

I have a very nice Gilbert and Bacon N173 proof of 30 game winner and Columbus Solons player Hank Gastright AKA Hank Gastreich. This cabinet is now housed in an SGC 10 slab to protect it. I have never seen another proof with the Goodwin copyright written into the physical card, nor have I seen another Columbus proof. 

This card is SOLD. 

[IMG]http://i107.photobucket.com/albums/m294/madjams/N173Proof_zpsbb46047a.jpg[/IMG]

I'll take it.


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Card has been sold. Thanks everyone.
